document_data.name: Falar Aporos
document_data.deathnotes: Prior to [[1373 DR]]All that is knowable about the short story ''New in Town'' is that it happens before 1373, the events of [[The Rage]]. The exact time prior is unknowable at the moment.
document_data.mainbody: '''Falar Aporos''' was a criminal in [[Calaunt]].{{cite dragon/320/New in Town|68-70}}
document_data.Description: He was young, lanky and clean-shaven. His hair was curly, and his face was foxy. He wore a finely stitched and embroidered cloak, jerkin and breeches.{{cite dragon/320/New in Town|62}}
document_data.Personality: Falar was thought to be always looking for an advantage. {{cite dragon/320/New in Town|66}}
document_data.Possessions: Falar Aporos had at least one sword. He also employed a sling.
document_data.History:
Falar Aporos rescued [[Taegan Nightwind]] from an ambush. {{cite dragon/320/New in Town|62}} Afterwards, they discussed his fate, and Taegan volunteered to steal [[Arveene Dalurieth]], whom Falar described as his beloved, from the tower where her father kept her.{{cite dragon/320/New in Town|63}}

However, Falar was actually behind the ambush, which he used as cover to kill [[Vonn Dalurieth]]'s [[dire bear]] and steal the other with his men.{{cite dragon/320/New in Town|65-66}} Taegan Nightwind found him days later hiding in a warehouse with the bear. There was a fight, and Falar was killed by the stolen bear during it.
